pages.title: Applying Colored Palettes
pages.text: Currently, to apply a color to a pedestal, you must have a newly placed pedestal. $(br)It $(l)CANNOT$() be linked, have items, augments, tools, filters, glowstone, or redstone torches, inserted. $(br)Put the Colored Palette in your $(l)OFFHAND$() and $(l)RIGHT CLICK$() with an empty $(l)MAINHAND$() $(br)This Consumes the Palette and colors the pedestal permanently.
